snippet: The police said that they had not captured the man who opened fire in a crowded food court at Toronto Eaton Center, leaving a 25-year-old man dead.
lead_paragraph: The police said that they had not captured the man who opened fire in a crowded food court at Toronto Eaton Center, leaving a 25-year-old man dead.

headline.seo: Gunman Kills One and Injures Seven at Toronto Mall
headline.main: Gunman Kills One and Injures Seven at Toronto Mall
headline.print_headline: Gunman Kills One and Injures Seven at Toronto Mall
